English: This evaluation is so important, listen carefully.
Arabic: هذا التقييم مهم جداً، انصت بعناية
EnglishOld: This evaluation is important, so listen carefully.

English: Look at the following words and pictures.
EnglishOld: There are words and images on this screen.

English: Using lines, connect the correct word with its picture.
Arabic: صل الكلمة المناسبة بالرسم المناسب عن طريق رسم خط بينهما
EnglishOld: Draw lines so that each word has its right picture.

English: Hmm, Let's look at the evaluation result.
Arabic: هممم، لنتمعَن سوياً في نتيجة التقييم
EnglishOld: Let me have a look on that… hmmmm

English: Great result! I am really impressed.
EnglishOld: It’s fantastic! I’m really impressed.

English: Your performance was excellent!
EnglishOld: You did a very good job

English: Acceptable try, but we have to investigate this area.
Arabic: محاولة لا بأس بها، لكن علينا استكشاف هذه المنطقة من جديد
EnglishOld: It’s promising, but we should explore this zone again

English: Match the correct words with their images.
Arabic: طابق كل كلمة مع صورتها المناسبة
EnglishOld: Match the words with their images!

English: Pay attention carefully!
EnglishOld: Pay attention to this one!

English: Do not pop the letter balloons.
Arabic: لا تفرقع بالونات الأحرف التي تراها في الكلمة!
EnglishOld: Keep the good letters flying.

English: Pop only the balloons of the letters that are unavailable in the word quickly.
Arabic: فرقع البالونات التي تحمل الحروف الغير موجودة في الكلمة و بسرعة.
EnglishOld: Only pop the balloons of the wrong letters

English: Oh no!
EnglishOld: Oh no!

English: Ouch!
EnglishOld: Outch !

English: All the best.
EnglishOld: I hope everything goes well

English: Time up
Do not wake up Antura!
EnglishOld: Do not wake up Antura!

English: Shhh! All are asleep.
EnglishOld: Shhhh! Everybody is sleeping…

English: Move the picture toward the word without waking up anyone.
Arabic: حرك الصورة نحو الكلمة دون ايقاظ احد
EnglishOld: Try to move the image towards the word without waking up anyone.

English: especially Antura.
EnglishOld: And especially, don't touch Antura

English: Aha, here we go again.
Arabic: اههه، ها نحن نعود من جديد
EnglishOld: Pfffff, it’s always the same

English: Do not touch Antura the dog!
EnglishOld: Oooh! There are Living Words wandering here!

English: Do not touch the alarms!
EnglishOld: You must drag the right ones to the drop zone.

English: Don't go too fast! drag the word slowly!
Arabic: لا تسرع ! اسحب الكلمة على مهل !
EnglishOld: Do we have enough of them?

English: Don't drop the word, before getting to the image
Arabic: لا تسقط الكلمة قبل الوصول الى الصورة!
EnglishOld: Nice, look at these beautiful specimens!

English: Look! There are some living words wandering here.
Arabic: أنظر، بعض الكلمات الحية تتجول هنا.
EnglishOld: Catch the right living letters and drag them to the drop zone.

English: You have to drag the correct words into the dropping zone.
Arabic: عليك سحب الكلمات المناسبة الى مربع الاسقاط
EnglishOld: Hurry up, we don’t have much time.

English: Do we have enough?
EnglishOld: catch the letters

English: Wow! Look at these wonderful creatures.
Arabic: جميل، يا لها من مخلوقات رائعة!
EnglishOld: well done

English: Catch the correct living letters and drag them into the dropping zone.
Arabic: التقط الحروف المناسبة و اسحبهم إلى مربع الاسقاط
EnglishOld: great!

English: Hurry up! We are running out of time.
EnglishOld: Hey you! Yes you!

English: Find this word
EnglishOld: We need your help right now!

English: Word completed
EnglishOld: You are in the living letters territory. They are all around you

English: Find this word group
EnglishOld: Please try to catch some of them for us

English: Pick up the letters.
EnglishOld: You did a great job! We need to continue to explore this area.

English: Well done!
EnglishOld: I’m sure we’ll find some more interesting specimens around here

English: Great job!
EnglishOld: Kid, You did a fantastic job during the last missions.

English: Hey you! Yes you!
EnglishOld: But we are not playing anymore… I must evaluate you.

English: We need your help right now.
Arabic: نحتاج لمساعدتك فوراً! نحتاج لمساعدتك حالاً؟
EnglishOld: Do you really know the species living in this region? We’ll see.

English: You are in the living letters' territory. They are surrounding you.
Arabic: انت في اراضي الحروف الحية! ستجدهم منتشرين في المكان.
EnglishOld: Be ready

English: Please try to catch some of them. Please try to pick up some of them.
Arabic: من فضلك، حاول اصطياد البعض منها
EnglishOld: How are you today?

English: You did a great job! We need to investigate this are more.
Arabic: كان ادائك رائعاً! علينا متابعة استكشاف هذه المنطقة
EnglishOld: How do you feel now?

English: I am sure you will find more exciting creatures here.
Arabic: انا واثق  من انك ستجد مخلوقات اكثر غرابة و مثيرة للاعجاب!
EnglishOld: Thank you so much for your help today!

English: You did an awesome job during the previous missions.
Arabic: ادائك كان عظيماً خلال المهمات السابقة!
EnglishOld: I hope you’ll come back soon to explore new regions with us.

English: We have to stop playing for now. I need to evaluate you.
Arabic: علينا ايقاف اللعب الان. سوف نقوم بتقييم جدي
EnglishOld: Bye!

English: Let's see how good you are in recognizing the living letters in this area.
Arabic: لنرى كم انت ضليع في معرفة الحروف الحية في هذه المنطقة
EnglishOld: Very well

English: Get ready!
EnglishOld: Good, but you can improve

English: How are you doing today?
EnglishOld: Ahh.. i think you retry next time.

English: How do you feel now?
EnglishOld: Good work, we’ll get more next time

English: Thank you very much for your help today.
EnglishOld: That’s very well done

English: I hope you come soon to explore new areas.
Arabic: امل ان تعود قريباً لاستكشاف مناطق جديدة معنا
EnglishOld: You did a perfect job!

English: Goodbye!
EnglishOld: It’s the end of this mission. And look at that!

English: Excellent!
EnglishOld: It’s seems you win something to customize Antura

English: Good, although you can still do better.
Arabic: جيد، انا واثق من قدرتك على تحسين النتيجة
EnglishOld: Congratulation.

English: No worries, you can re-try next time.
EnglishOld: I’m sure Antura will love it

English: Good, you can get more next time.
Arabic: جيد، سنحصل على المزيد في المرة المقبلة...
EnglishOld: You did a lot of efforts to contribute to the Living Letters collection

English: Impressive performance!
EnglishOld: I have a little gift for you

English: Wonderful job!
EnglishOld: Living Letters

English: End of this mission. Look here!
Arabic: انظر الى هذا! انها نهاية المرحلة.
EnglishOld: Antura and the letters!

English: You won some upgrades for Antura
Arabic: لقد ربحت شيئاً رائعاً، انها تخصيصات لتعديل شكل عنتورة
EnglishOld: My dog Antura will help you to find the letters.

English: Congratulations!
EnglishOld: but he’s not very focused on his job.

English: I am sure Antura will love these.
Arabic: انا واثق ان عنتورة سيحب هذه الاضافات!
EnglishOld: Well!

English: You did huge efforts in collecting the living letters.
Arabic: قمت بمجهود عظيم خلال مساهمتك بالتقاط الحروف الحية!
EnglishOld: This is the wheel game, we use it to attract the living letters. They loooove to play.

English: I have a special gift for you!
EnglishOld: Come on turn the wheel!

English: The living letters.
EnglishOld: Ah ah! It’s the game Fast crowd! Let see what we can catch with it

English: Antura and the letters.
EnglishOld: turn the wheel

English: My dog Antura will help you find the letters.
Arabic: كلبي عنتورة سيساعدك في العثور على الحروف
EnglishOld: Time to catch some more living letters!

English: He is not focused on his job.
Arabic: لكن التركيز ليس من افضل سماته خلال العمل
EnglishOld: The ballooooon. You're gonna catch many of them with it

English: Fine!
EnglishOld: Hummmm, interesting.

English: This is the wheel game which is used to attract the living letters. They love it!
Arabic: هذه لعبة الدولاب، نستعملها لجذب انتباه الحروف. انها تعشششق اللعب
EnglishOld: Ok

English: Come on, let's spin the wheel!
EnglishOld: Where is Antura? Oh no, he felt asleep among the Living Words specimens…

English: Aha! It is the fast crowd game! Let's see what we can catch today.
Arabic: اااه! لعبة جماهير الحروف! لنرى ماذا سنصطاد اليوم؟

English: Spin the wheel.
It is time to pick up more living letters.
Arabic: حان الوقت لالتقاط المزيد من الحروف!

English: The balloon game! You will catch so many letters with the baloon.
Arabic: لعبة البالونات. سوف تصطاد فيها الكثير من الحروف

English: Hmm, interesting.
Okay
Where is Antura? He is sleeping among the living letter creatures.
Arabic: اين هو عنتورة؟ اهه كلا، انه يأخذ قيلولة وسط منطقة الحروف الحية!

English: Word croud
Word group completed
Result
